TextView.android:text: Dublin City Council: Water, Drainage and wastewater: Confined Space Entry Checklist
This form must be compleated before anyone entres the Confined Space
Any Work that might produce sparks, heat or toxic fumes or gases requires a seperate risk assessment.
1/ Tick the appropriate box below for the PPE you are using.
2/ Tick One Box that Describes the Confined Space and the Activity you are about to undertake:
• Continuous Attachment to Safety Line and Hoist
• Working Without an Attached Safety Line
3/ Ensure that you have all the controls in place appropriate to the level of Confined Space that you have identified. Tick correct box in the checklist below.
Isolation of Valves or power sources
If All appropriate controls are not in place then DO NOT ENTER the Confined Space and inform your supervisor immediately.
